data.description: Loveland City Council members will have to limit their sugar intake after a very sweet presentation on traffic safety by six kindergarten students from High Plains K-8 School.

data.author: Gregg Montgomery
data.title: Colts to help Elkhart youth football team go to championships
data.description: INDIANAPOLIS (WISH) -- The Elkhart, Indiana, Cowboys football team scored an Indianapolis Colts sponsorship to send the youths to the NFL FLAG Championships at the AFC–NFC Pro Bowl. The team is made up of kids 10 and younger. They'll compete with the top girls' and boys' FLAG football teams from across the county [...]The post Colts to help Elkhart youth football team go to championships appeared first on WISH-TV | Indianapolis News | Indiana Weather | Indiana Traffic.

data.description: A Qantas flight has issued a mayday call following a reported engine failure after leaving from Auckland to Sydney.

data.title: Iowa City barber Yoel Castillo serves community, Hawkeye athletes
data.description: Iowa men’s basketball center Filip Rebraca scored a team-high 24 points when the Hawkeyes hosted Eastern Illinois at Carver-Hawkeye Arena on Dec. 21. Rebraca  still decided something needed to change after the Hawkeyes’ loss. So, the 6-foot-9 Serbian, who had sported a low-drop fade hairstyle — long on the top and shaved on the sides...The post Iowa City barber Yoel Castillo serves community, Hawkeye athletes appeared first on The Daily Iowan.

data.title: Fusion Micro Finance organizes financial literacy program in Bhawanipatna, Odisha
data.description: Bhawanipatna:  Fusion Micro Finance, India’s second largest NBFC-MFI, providing underprivileged women with economic opportunities, organized a Financial Literacy program inBhawanipatna, Odisha. During the session, women were explained about the importance of financial literacy and approximately160 women from Bhawanipatna village participated in the awareness program.   Fusion Micro Finance undertook this initiative of explaining the importance […]

data.title: Archaeologists in Egypt discover mysterious ancient burial site containing a child with 142 dogs
data.description: A mysterious ancient burial site containing a child with 142 dogs has been discovered by archaeologists at the Faiyum Oasis necropolis in Egypt.   According to the website of the Centre for Egyptological Research of the Russian Academy of Sciences (CEI RAS), archaeologists in Egypt have found a mysterious burial site. data.title: William Nylander lifts Leafs past Panthers in OT
data.description: William Nylander scored his second goal of the game at 1:53 of overtime and the Toronto Maple Leafs defeated the visiting Florida Panthers 5-4 on Tuesday night. data.author: Reuters
data.title: Yen sinks after BOJ sticks to ultra-easy policy
data.description: SINGAPORE — The Japanese yen sank on Wednesday after the Bank of Japan maintained ultra-low interest rates, disappointing some of the investors who had hoped the central bank would tweak its yield curve control policy further. The central bank stunned the market last month by raising its cap on the 10-year yield to 0.5% from […]

data.title: Microsoft layoffs 2023 news: Tech company to cut thousands of jobs across divisions
data.description: Microsoft layoffs 2023 news: The expected layoffs would be the latest in the US technology sector, where companies including Amazon.com Inc and Meta Platforms Inc have announced retrenchment exercises in response to slowing demand and a worsening global economic outlook.
